headline: Templeton Emerging Markets Fund Announces Board Initiatives Intended to Reduce Fund Discount
summary: NEW YORK, February 26, 2025--Templeton Emerging Markets Fund [NYSE: EMF] ("EMF" or the "Fund") today announced initiatives of the Fund’s Board of Trustees ("Board") designed to reduce the Fund’s discount to net asset value ("NAV") and benefit shareholders. These initiatives include a management fee reduction, a managed distribution plan and a share repurchase program.
